verbose_text: Interestingly, controversial results were recorded in the literature that knockdown of IFT27 caused the dissociation of IFT particles, loss of flagella and even defects in cytokinesis in C. reinhardtii, or led to failure to import IFT-A and IFT dynein into flagella in T. brucei.
evidence: IFT27 caused the dissociation of IFT particles, loss of flagella and even defects in cytokinesis in C. reinhardtii              , or led to failure to import IFT-A and IFT dynein
